This class represents a Warning that is created by the NITF system while processing the data in some way.
FileHeader - Class in nitf
Represents the NITF file header

In NITF, the file header is the first section of a file (before the image subheaders).

WriteHandler - Class in nitf
The WriteHandler class is essentially an interface for writing to an IOInterface, but is an abstract class because under the covers it sets up some native code that will facilitate the callback to your write method.
